sourcesContent:
<template>
 
   <MovieCard v-for="(a,i) in title.length" :key="i" :relaased="released[i]" :genre="genre[i]" :writer="writer[i]"  :title="title[i]" :poster="poster[i]"/>
   
   
 
  
</template>

<script> 
import axios from 'axios'
import MovieCard from './components/MovieCard.vue'

export default {
  
  name: 'App',
  data(){
  return {
       title : [],
       released : [],
       genre : [],
       writer : [],
       poster : []
  }
 
  },
  created(){
    const apiKey = 'fac1af98'
    const id = 'tt3896198'
    let mtitle = 'city';
let titlebox = this.title;
let imgbox = this.poster;
let typebox = this.type;
let yearbox = this.year;
let writerbox = this.writer
 axios.get(`http://www.omdbapi.com/?i=${id}&apikey=${apiKey}&s=${mtitle}`).then( 결과 => {
   for(let i = 0; i < 결과.data.Search.length; i++){
  titlebox.push(결과.data.Search[i].Title) // 영화 제목
  typebox.push(결과.data.Search[i].Type); // 영화 출시일
  yearbox.push(결과.data.Search[i].Year); // 영화 장르
  writerbox.push(결과.data.Search[i].Writer); // 영화 등장인물
  imgbox.push(결과.data.Search[i].Poster) // 영화 포스터

 
  }
    console.log(결과)
    console.log(this.title)
  })
  },
  
  components: { 
    MovieCard
    },
 
}
 


  

</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
